tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE client_communications (
  communication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id UUID,
  communication_type VARCHAR(50),
  communication_date TIMESTAMP,
  communication_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ClientInteractions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT NOT NULL,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    interaction_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Clients(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Clients (
    client_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
  communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT REFERENCES clients(client_id),
  communication_date DATE,
  communication_type VARCHAR(50),
  communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  communication_id INT REFERENCES communications(communication_id),
  interaction_date DATE,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    communication_date DATE,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50),
    communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    interaction_date DATE,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    task_name VARCHAR(100),
    task_description TEXT,
    task_due_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
  communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  communication_type VARCHAR(20),
  communication_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES clients(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(20),
  interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES clients(client_id)
);

CREATE TABLE notes (
  note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  interaction_id INT,
  note_text TEXT,
  note_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (interaction_id) REFERENCES interactions(interaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
  task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  task_description TEXT,
  task_due_date DATE,
  task_status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Pending',
  FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES clients(client_id)
);
